explanation: To determine whether mutex_thread violates the MISRA rule against direct or indirect recursion you must examine every function it calls and any functions those call. mutex_thread directly calls metal_mutex_acquire and metal_mutex_release, so you need the definitions (or otherwise complete call targets) of those two functions to check whether they (directly or via further callees) call back into mutex_thread (forming a recursion cycle).
